creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
markings: red artist's seal: (sculling oar leaf) 梶の葉 | LRC, artist's hand-applied red approval seal: 名取 {Natori}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper with mica on fan
portfolio: Creative Prints: Collected Portraits by Shunsen (Sōsaku hanga: Shunsen nigao-e shū 創作版画　春仙似顔画集)
text: Fourteenth design of a set of 36. Based on Jitsukawa Enjaku II as Danshichi Kurobei in the scene Tsurifune sabu uchi of the play Natsu matsuri naniwa kagami 夏祭浪花鑑　釣船三婦内 (Summer festival: Mirror of Osaka), performed at the Kabuki Theater, August 1925.
title: Actor Jitsukawa Enjaku II as Danshichi
